smoothies.name: Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1.25 cups unsweetened almond milk (or more, to taste)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients for your green smoothie into a high-speed blender or Vitamix and blend until smooth.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender and mix on high until smooth. Option to add a little bit more orange juice depending on how thick/thin you like your smoothies. Serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Peanut Butter Banana Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Add more almond milk as needed. Serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Banana Spinach Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: First, line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Then, evenly spread out 2 cups of sliced bananas, 2 cups of whole strawberries. Place in the freezer for about 2 hours or until completely frozen. Next, take 4 quart-size freezer bags and write the date and Strawberry Banana Green Smoothie on the front. Add 1 cup of the frozen fruit, a handful of spinach, and a teaspoon of chia seeds to each bag. Before sealing, make sure you squeeze as much air out as possible to prevent freezer burn. Seal and place in the freezer for later use. Once you’re ready to blend, empty contents of spinach smoothie bag into a high-speed blender. Then, add about 1/2 cup of almond milk and 2 tablespoons of your favorite protein powder. Blend on high for about 1 minute or until everything is blended.

smoothies.name: Triple Berry Protein Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender and mix until smooth.

smoothies.name: Healthy Banana Protein Smothie
ingredients: ¾ cup nonfat Greek yogurt, frozen into cubes
¼ cup vanilla protein powder (we used Garden of Life Raw Organic Protein)
2 cups milk, any kind (we used Almond Breeze Unsweetened Vanilla Almond Milk)
smoothies.instructions: First, freeze ¾ cup nonfat Greek Yogurt in an ice cube tray. Once the Greek yogurt has fully frozen, place all ingredients for healthy banana shake into a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth and serve with your favorite toppings.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Banana Smoothie with Peanut Butter
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender and mix until smooth. Serve with a drizzle of peanut butter and fresh fruit.

smoothies.name: Pumpkin Berry Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high speed blender and blend on high until smooth. Scrape the sides of the blender and add additional almond milk (1 teaspoon at a time) if smoothie is too thick. Blend until smooth. Serve with homemade granola or fruit toppings and enjoy!

smoothies.name: Chocolate Protein Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high for around 1 minute, stopping to scrape the sides. You may need to add more milk to thin as needed. Serve immediately!

smoothies.name: Pumpkin Smoothie
ingredients: 3/4 cup coffee, cold (I just used leftover from the morning’s pot!)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high for around 1 minute, stopping to scrape the sides if needed. Serve immediately with your favorite whipped topping.

smoothies.name: Blueberry Banana Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into a high speed blender and blend until smooth.

smoothies.name: Pomegranate Green Smoothie
ingredients: toppings: hemp seeds, pomegranate arils, pistachio nuts, and dark chocolate
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high speed food processor and mix until smooth. You may need to add a bit more pomegranate juice depending on how thick you like your smoothies.

smoothies.name: Apple Pie Smoothie
ingredients: optional: handful of fresh spinach or kale
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender. Blend until smooth. Serve with lots of fixings on top!

smoothies.name: Apple Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup unsweetened almond milk (or any kind of milk)
smoothies.instructions: First, freeze 90gr apple sauce cups for at least 2 hours or overnight. Once frozen, run the applesauce cups under hot water for a few seconds to remove from the plastic. Then place into a high-speed blender. Add the rest of the ingredients and cover. Blend on high for around a minute or until smooth.

smoothies.name: Strawberry Pineapple Smoothie
ingredients: 1.5 cups almond milk, unsweetened (or more to taste)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients for your strawberry pineapple smoothie into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Depending on how frozen your fruit is, you may need to add more almond milk. Serve with extra fresh pineapple chunks on the bottom.

smoothies.name: Magical Orange Creamsicle Smoothie
ingredients: optional: 1 scoop vanilla protein powder, coconut whipped cream, orange zest
smoothies.instructions: Place frozen bananas, vanilla extract, and orange juice into a high-speed blender and blend until smooth. Option at this point to add a handful of ice (depending on thickness preference) and/or other add-ins such as vanilla protein powder and fresh orange zest. Blend one more time and then serve immediately.

smoothies.name: Mango Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all of the ingredients into a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Eat immediately.

smoothies.name: Kale Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients in a high-speed blender. Blend on high until smooth. Option to add more orange juice as needed to thin things out. Serve smoothie immediately and top with your favorite toppings.

smoothies.name: Carrot Cake Smoothie
ingredients: 1 large carrot, roughly chopped (or grated if you don’t have a high speed blender)
Extra finely grated carrot for mixing in, optional
Sprinkle of nutmeg, freshly grated is EXTRA delicious
½–1 cup of liquid, I typically use non-dairy milk and then add in water if I want it a bit more liquidy
smoothies.instructions: In a high speed blender, blend all ingredients (minus the additional carrot) together until creamy and smooth. If desired, mix in additional finely grated carrot (highly recommend!). Top with a few chopped walnuts and ENJOY!

smoothies.name: Golden Milk Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 1 teaspoon turmeric (you could totally leave this out if you want a plain mango smoothie!)
1 frozen banana or 1 cup of cauliflower
optional: splash of milk or water if you need help getting the blender going
smoothies.instructions: In a high speed blender, combine all of the ingredients and blend until smooth. If needed, add more liquid, a tablespoon at a time, to get the blender going. I like my smoothies on the thicker side but add some milk/ water as needed. Serve and ENJOY.

smoothies.name: Caramel Apple Green Smoothie
ingredients: 1 frozen banana (could leave this out but sub for a few ice cubes)
almond milk (could substitute for apple juice for a stronger apple taste)
sprinkle of cinnamon (or a couple sprinkles)
smoothies.instructions: Add all of the ingredients (minus the caramel) to a high speed blender and blend on high. Drizzle a little of the caramel sauce around your glass and pour the smoothie into the glass. Top with a bit more of the caramel sauce and ENJOY.

smoothies.name: Oatmeal Smoothie
ingredients: 1/4 cup old-fashioned oats or quick oats
1 banana chopped into chunks and frozen
1/2 tablespoon pure maple syrup plus additional to taste
1/8 teaspoon kosher salt don’t skip this, as it makes the oatmeal pop
ce optional, add at the end if you want a thicker smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Place the oats in the bottom of a blender and pulse a few times until finely ground. Add the banana, milk, peanut butter, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt. Blend until smooth and creamy, stopping to scrape down the blender as needed. Taste and add additional sweetener if you’d like a sweeter smoothie. Enjoy immediately.

smoothies.name: Grapefruit Smoothie
ingredients: grapefruit segments, berries and granola (for topping)
smoothies.instructions: Segment grapefruit over a bowl so you can collect all the juice. Set 2-3 segments aside for topping. Add grapefruit segments, grapefruit juice, frozen pineapple, Greek yogurt, coconut oil and fresh ginger into a high-powered blender and blend until smooth. Taste and adjust ingredients based on your preference. If smoothie is too thick you can add a little non-dairy milk. Pour into two glasses and enjoy. Or serve in a bowl with your favorite toppings — grapefruit segments, granola, berries, etc.

smoothies.name: Paleo Purple Sweet Potato Smoothie
ingredients: 1 cup cubed purple sweet potato, pre-cooked & frozen
smoothies.instructions: Add all ingredients to blender cup. Blend until smooth. Add more (or less) liquid for desired consistency. I used 1 cup of milk and it was fairly thick. Add more liquid or milk to drink through straw.

smoothies.name: Chai Pumpkin Protein Smoothie
ingredients: 2 Medjool dates, pitted (or sub another sweetener such as 1/2 TBS maple syrup)
1/2 cup pumpkin puree* (option to freeze into cubes)
2/3 cup*** cashew milk (or milk of choice)
smoothies.instructions: Place all ingredients into blender cup starting with AllWhites® 100% liquid egg whites, ending with cashew milk. See notes below regarding frozen pumpkin versus fresh and amount of milk needed. Blend until smooth. Transfer pumpkin protein smoothie into cup or travel mug, enjoy!

smoothies.name: Creamy Citrus Ginger Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup coconut milk (or milk of choice)
1 1″ cube fresh ginger, skin removed and chopped
smoothies.instructions: Add all of the ingredients into blender – make sure your oranges are segmented if you prefer a more pulp-free orange juice. 2. Blend until smooth. Add more ice or liquid for desired consistency.

smoothies.name: Antioxidant Smoothie
smoothies.instructions: Combine all ingredients, including almond milk, in a high speed blender. Blend until creamy, adding additional almond milk if necessary.

smoothies.name: Coffee Banana Smoothie
ingredients: 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk or milk of choice
1/2 cup freshly brewed organic coffee or cold brew, place in fridge for 10 minutes
1 scoop protein powder (I like Vital Proteins Collagen Peptides)
Optional: 1 teaspoon honey or sweetener of choice
smoothies.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a high speed blender. Blend until creamy. Taste and add additional sweetener if needed.
